thread.section_title: The Logo Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Logo Company | thelogocompany.net
thread.title: Ariel
thread.title_full: The Logo Company reviewed by Ariel

author: Ariel
title: Ariel
text: My experience with the Logo Company has been an exceptional one. All I did was tell them a little about our facility and they were able to come up with a perfect logo within days. All of the initial concepts they sent us were great and after choosing one, we went through one round of revisions before we had the perfect logo. We purchased the Stationary + Logo and our experience with the stationary was just as wonderful. Once again we had a some amazing initial concepts, went through one round of revisions, and had our final files shortly afterwards. Their work was very quick but definitely didn't lack in quality. In less than two weeks, we were able to get a brand new logo along with all the stationary that goes with it. I would definitely recommend this company to anyone who is in the market for a new logo!
